item.title: Fully reproducible NixOS builds
item.description: One of big strengths of NixOS is reproducible builds. Yet achieving full reproducibility requires a bit of effort. The minimal set of things needed is a configuration.nix and a reference to a nixpkgs commit. And the easiest way to achieve this is to have a git-repo with configuration, which also references nixpkgs as a submodule.
